actions.name: Grave Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. Heavy necrotic damage.

actions.name: Binding Chains (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Restrains enemies within 10 ft.

monsters.name: Marid
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The marid can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Elemental Demise
traits.desc: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The marid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: create or destroy water, detect evil and good, detect magic, fog cloud, purify food and drink
3/day each: tongues, water breathing, water walk
1/day each: conjure elemental (water elemental only), control water, gaseous form, invisibility, plane shift

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The marid makes two trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack_: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit_: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Water jet
actions.desc: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked prone. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: _<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=entangle|entangle<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=phantasmal-force|phantasmal force<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>_
2/day each: _<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=disguise-self|disguise self<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=invisibility|invisibility<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>_ (self only)

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Running Leap
traits.desc: The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit_: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit_: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The necromancer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Spell Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 25 (4d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The necromancer casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

 At will: <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#dancing%20lights_phb|dancing lights<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#mage%20hand_phb|mage hand<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#prestidigitation_phb|prestidigitation<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>

 2/day each: <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#bestow%20curse_phb|bestow curse<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#dimension%20door_phb|dimension door<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#mage%20armor_phb|mage armor<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#web_phb|web<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>

 1/day: <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#circle%20of%20death_phb|circle of death<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>

bonus_actions.name: Summon Undead (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The necromancer magically summons five **skeletons** or **zombies**. The summoned creatures appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the necromancer, whom they obey. They take their turns immediately after the necromancer. Each lasts for 1 hour, until it or the necromancer dies, or until the necromancer dismisses it as a bonus action.

reactions.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
reactions.desc: When the necromancer kills a creature with necrotic damage, the necromancer regains 9 (2d8) hit points.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rotting Gaze
actions.desc: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Weird Insight
actions.desc: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic’s Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

monsters.name: Water Weird
monsters.damage_resistances: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands Aquan but does not speak

traits.name: Invisible in Water
traits.desc: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

traits.name: Water Bound
traits.desc: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. _Hit_: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

monsters.name: Lost Sorrowsworn
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing while in dim light or darkness

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sorrowsworn makes two Arm Spike attacks.

actions.name: Arm Spike
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Embrace (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#grappled_phb|grappled<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> (escape DC 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#frightened_phb|frightened<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, and it takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The sorrowsworn can grapple only one creature at a time.

reactions.name: Tightening Embrace
reactions.desc: If the sorrowsworn takes damage, the creature <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#grappled_phb|grappled<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> by Embrace takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Lonely Sorrowsworn
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Psychic Leech
traits.desc: At the start of each of the sorrowsworn's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Thrives on Company
traits.desc: The sorrowsworn has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sorrowsworn makes one Harpoon Arm attack, and it uses Sorrowful Embrace.

actions.name: Harpoon Arm
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#grappled_phb|grappled<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The sorrowsworn has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

actions.name: Sorrowful Embrace
actions.desc: Each creature <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#grappled_phb|grappled<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> by the sorrowsworn must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the sorrowsworn pulls each of those creatures up to 30 feet straight toward it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The spiderdragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spiderdragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spiderdragon ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spiderdragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spiderling Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The spiderdragon exhales venomous spiderlings in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) piercing damage and 33 (6d10) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus_actions.name: Stifling Webs (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc:
The spiderdragon spins a 30-foot cube of strong, sticky webbing in an area adjacent to itself. The webbing lasts for 1 minute, is difficult terrain, and lightly obscures its area. A creature that starts its turn in the webbing or enters the webbing for the first time on its turn must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or have the <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#restrained_phb|restrained<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> condition while in the web. As an action, a creature can free itself or another creature from the web by succeeding on a DC 15 Strength check.
A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 10 acid, fire, or slashing damage on a single turn.

monsters.name: Yochlol
monsters.damage_resistances: Cold, Fire, Lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The yochlol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#detect%20thoughts_phb|detect thoughts<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#web_phb|web<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>
1/day: <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/spells.html#dominate%20person_phb|dominate person<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 feet in demon form), one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Mist Form
actions.desc:
The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the yochlol is <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#incapacitated_phb|incapacitated<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.
While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#poisoned_phb|poisoned<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> until the start of its next turn. While <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#poisoned_phb|poisoned<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> in this way, the target is <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>https://5e.tools/conditionsdiseases.html#incapacitated_phb|incapacitated<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>.
